title: In Affluent Greenwich, It’s Republicans vs. ‘Trumplicans’
description: The Connecticut suburb was once home to George Bush and has historically been a moderate conservative stronghold. But new hard-liners are on the attack, galvanized by the culture wars.
dc:creator: Dan Barry
media:credit: Dave Sanders for The New York Times
media:description: Passers-by on Greenwich Ave this month. Some residents say the local Republican committee has been overtaken by far-right activists.
